title: Expand the anomaly detection packages with more effective algorithms
content: Implementation of new anomaly detection algorithms, in addition to the existing models.

title: Integration with agenticAI systems
content: Integrating agenticAI systems into the digitalization process pipeline, both from the process design perspective and the maintenance of data analysis algorithms.

title: Increase the speed and scalability of root cause algorithms
content: Using Flink technology to scale root cause algorithms for faster and more dynamic use.
